#summary How to input entries from an Excel file

=== The input ===
Here's what the input spreadsheet file looks like.  We're going to input every row in this file.  

http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/input-from-excel/Screenshot-inputFromExcel-spreadsheet.png

----
=== Start the input ===
  * Open the bout-time application.
  * Select *File* -> *Input From Excel File*

http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/input-from-excel/Screenshot-inputFromExcel-menu.png

----
=== Select the data columns ===
Specify the columns where the data can be found.  Enter a zero to indicate that there is no data in the input file for the data.  

For Column "A", select "1".

Click *Next* when done.

http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/input-from-excel/Screenshot-inputFromExcel-columns.png

----
=== Select sheet and rows ===
Specify the sheet number, and start and end rows.

Click *Next* when done.

http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/input-from-excel/Screenshot-inputFromExcel-sheet.png
----
=== Select the input file ===
Specify the input spreadsheet file.  This can either be typed in, or the _"Browse"_ button can be used. 

Click *Finish* when done.

http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/input-from-excel/Screenshot-inputFromExcel-file.png

----
=== Review the summary ===
Review the summary details.  This shows how many records were processed, accepted, and rejected.

Click *Close* when done.

http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/input-from-excel/Screenshot-inputFromExcel-summary.png
----
=== Finish ===
After inputting the entries, they will appear in the bout-time application.

http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/input-from-excel/Screenshot-inputFromExcel-masterList.png
